metadata.title: CVE-2022-2326 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions before15.0.5, all versions starting from 15.1 before 15.1.4, all versionsstarting from 15.2 before 15.2.1. It may be possible to gain access to aprivate project through an email invite by using other user's email addressas an unverified secondary email.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
